amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to reduce funding for CISA by 25%.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency by $1,778,222,250.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 320 (Roll no. 445).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 320 (Roll no. 445).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
